Method `format()` overloads a compatible method of a superclass, when overriding might have been intended
in `poi/src/main/java/org/apache/poi/ss/usermodel/FractionFormat.java`
#### Snippet
```java

    @SuppressWarnings("squid:S2111")
    public String format(Number num) {
        final double d = num.doubleValue();
        return format(new BigDecimal(d));
```

#### Snippet

```java
    @SuppressWarnings("java:S1201")
    public boolean equals(ClassID classID) {

    }
```

```java
                            LookupValueComparer matchComparer = createTolerantLookupComparer(valueEval, true, true);
                            if (matchComparer.compareTo(bestMatchEval).isGreaterThan()) {
                                bestMatchIdx = i;
                                bestMatchEval = valueEval;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    break;
            }
        }
        return bestMatchIdx;
```
